KnowledgeBase.Title: isDate
KnowledgeBase.ArgumentTypes: Character String Symbol Vector BitVector ByteVector IntVector Void FltVector ObjVector Structure Dictionary Directory Brick Pair List Matrix NumMatrix Integer Float Number Complex Boolean

Function.Description: The isDate function returns true if the specified argument is a Date type; otherwise, false is returned.

Brief.Overview: The isDate function returns true if the specified argument {obj} is a Date type; otherwise, false is returned.
Brief.Usage: The isDate function is used to determine if an object is a Date. An alternate method of determining if an object is a Date, is the use of the isType function. See the isType function.

Argument.Name: obj
Argument.AISTypes: Character String Symbol Vector BitVector ByteVector IntVector Void FltVector ObjVector Structure Dictionary Directory Brick Pair List Matrix NumMatrix Integer Float Number Complex Boolean

Syntax.Return: Returns true if the object is a Date, false is returned otherwise
